title: ranegg
author: ranegg
created_time: September 30, 2023, 07:27:52 AMLast edit: November 16, 2024, 01:15:21 PM by ranegg

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Ok, so let's talk about what this will actually do for a streamer. If you are a streamer who uses a viewbot and you go live, none of these viewers chat. None of them deposit, and none of them do anything for you except show you have viewers. What good is that for you as a streamer? If you are lucky enough to find a casino dumb enough to take a chance on you, you will be fired within 2 weeks since you have 0 interaction in your channel and 0 deposits from your viewers. I struggle to find the pros of using this service. Feel free to comment and tell me the advantages.

comments.author: makingmoney479
comments.body: Is it possible to add viewers and followers periodically, over time, so that it shows up smoothly on the graphs

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on October 07, 2023, 01:42:24 AMOk, so let's talk about what this will actually do for a streamer. If you are a streamer who uses a viewbot and you go live, none of these viewers chat. None of them deposit, and none of them do anything for you except show you have viewers. What good is that for you as a streamer? If you are lucky enough to find a casino dumb enough to take a chance on you, you will be fired within 2 weeks since you have 0 interaction in your channel and 0 deposits from your viewers. I struggle to find the pros of using this service. Feel free to comment and tell me the advantages.Don’t forget the part where if the streaming service finds out what you’re doing you’ll be shadowbanned and never allowed to make any real money. Even other streamers will quickly catch on and accuse you of view botting, resulting in your embarrassment and chasing away of any supporters you might have actually had.
